name: Lovebyte 2023 New Talent submission - Silent Snow, Secret Snow
name_original: Lovebyte 2023 New Talent submission - Silent Snow, Secret Snow
description:
Lovebyte 2023 New Talent submission - Silent Snow, Secret Snow is a game developed by DoomGoon. It came out on 13-01-2023.
Lovebyte 2023 New Talent submission - Silent Snow, Secret Snow is available on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
